lyrics:
20 contributorsrevolution lyricsintro
all my wolves begin to howl
wake me up the time is now
ooh can you hear the drumming
ooh theres a revolution coming

verse 1
wide awake the fever burns
sweat it out wait my turn
can you hear the drumming
theres a revolution coming
all this doubt is creepin in
inside out i shed my skin
can you hear the drumming
theres a revolution coming

prechorus 1
i been waitin all my life
to live when ive only been dreaming
get love when ive only been stealing
cant let time keep passing me by
run down what ive always been chasin
black out every fear ive been facin

chorus
all my wolves begin to howl
wake me up the time is now
ooh can you hear the drumming
ooh theres a revolution coming
wild things that turn me on
drag my dark into the dawn
ooh can you hear the drumming
ooh theres a revolution coming
you might also likeverse 2
body aches im bound in chains
but theres a fire in my veins yeah
can you hear the drumming
theres a revolution coming
like every king who lost a crown
and all those years are history now
can you hear the drumming
theres a revolution coming

prechorus 2
i been waitin all my life
run down what ive always been chasin
black out every fear ive been facin facin

drag my dark into the dawn

ooh theres a revolution coming

postchorus
theres a revolution coming
theres a revolution coming
ooh can you hear the drumming
ooh theres a revolution coming
bridge
im rising up up from the ground
from the bottom cant hold me down hold me down
im rising up up from the ground
from the bottom cant hold me down hold me down
hold me down down down down down down
